cn.crowdos.kernel.constraint

Class SpatioPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.crowdos.kernel.constraint.SpatioPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint, Decomposable<Constraint>

    public class SpatioPoint
extends Object
implements Constraint
    A spatial constraint that defines a circular region around a center point with a given radius. This class implements the Constraint interface and checks if a given Coordinate satisfies the constraint. It also provides a Decomposer for the SpatioPoint constraint.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpatioPoint(Coordinate center, double radius)
      Constructs a new SpatioPoint constraint with the given center point and radius.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Provides a Decomposer for the SpatioPoint constraint that returns a List containing only the SpatioPoint constraint itself.
      String description()
      Gets a description of the SpatioPoint constraint.
      Class<? extends Condition> getConditionClass()
      Gets the Condition class that this Constraint applies to.
      boolean satisfy(Condition condition)
      Checks if the given Condition satisfies the SpatioPoint constraint.
      String toString()
      Gets a string representation of the SpatioPoint constraint.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpatioPoint

        public SpatioPoint(Coordinate center,
                   double radius)
            throws InvalidConstraintException
        Constructs a new SpatioPoint constraint with the given center point and radius.
        Parameters:
        center - The center point of the circular region.
        radius - The radius of the circular region.
        Throws:
        InvalidConstraintException - if the radius is less than or equal to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • satisfy

        public boolean satisfy(Condition condition)
        Checks if the given Condition satisfies the SpatioPoint constraint.
        Specified by:
        satisfy in interface Constraint
        Parameters:
        condition - The Condition to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Condition is a Coordinate within the circular region defined by the SpatioPoint constraint, false otherwise.

      • decomposer

        public Decomposer<Constraint> decomposer()
        Provides a Decomposer for the SpatioPoint constraint that returns a List containing only the SpatioPoint constraint itself.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a new Decomposer instance.
